value.stringValue: Illumina Services Project : Record Triggered - Concierge Updates

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateAccepted
textTemplates.text: Dear {!$Record.Requestor_Name__c}, Your project request {!$Record.Name} was accepted by Illumina Concierge. You will receive an update when a Concierge Project Manager and/or Design Expert are assigned to this project.

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateAssigned
textTemplates.text: Dear {!$Record.Requestor_Name__c}, Your Concierge project {!$Record.Name} has been assigned to {!$Record.Design_Expert_Name__c}. {!$Record.Design_Expert_Name__c} will follow up shortly with the next steps.

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateClosed
textTemplates.text: Dear {!$Record.Requestor_Name__c}, Your Concierge project {!$Record.Name} has been closed out.

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateProjectOwnerChanged
textTemplates.text: Hello {!$Record.Design_Expert_Name__c}, You are the new project owner for {!$Record.Name}. Current Project Status: {!$Record.Project_Status__c}

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateRejected
textTemplates.text: Dear {!$Record.Requestor_Name__c}, Illumina Concierge reviewed your project request {!$Record.Name} and rejected your request for the following reason(s) {!$Record.Reason_for_Rejection__c}. Please feel free to submit a new request anytime.

textTemplates.name: EmailTemplateUnderEvaluation
textTemplates.text: Dear {!$Record.Requestor_Name__c}, Concierge obtained and began evaluating your request {!$Record.Name}
